txt.en: You have turned in a stack of trophies for a modest reward suitable for a collector such as yourself.
Wanted: Pure black skin from the beasts and worms surrounding the dwarf-home of Zigilgund. Deliver the items to Fotri, overseer of the settlement.
'We will use this wisely. Thank you.'
'We use the skins and fur from the beasts and worms to patch clothing and other such items. We could certainly use them now.'
Thorin's Hall Task: Pure Black Skin
Fotri, overseer of the dwarves of Forochel, awaits the delivery of pure black skin at the dwarf-home of Zigilgund.
Deliver the pure black skin to Fotri at Zigilgund in Forochel

You have accepted a task to collect and deliver pure black skin from the worms and beasts in the areas surrounding Zigilgund in Forochel. The items are to be delivered to the dwarf-overseer Fotri encamped at the dwarf-home.
Wanted: Pure black skin from the beasts and worms surrounding the dwarf-home of Zigilgund.
